summary: The code deletes the existing "questions.zip" file and creates a new one by adding all specified files (integratedEnergySystemPrototypes.py, cloudpss_inputs.json, questions.md, questions.pdf, cloudpss_ieslab_connectivity_matrix.xlsx, and cloudpss_topology_screenshot.jpg) into it using the 7z compression tool (questions.zip).

details.comment: The code deletes the existing "questions.zip" file and creates a new one by adding all specified files (integratedEnergySystemPrototypes.py, cloudpss_inputs.json, questions.md, questions.pdf, cloudpss_ieslab_connectivity_matrix.xlsx, and cloudpss_topology_screenshot.jpg) into it using the 7z compression tool (questions.zip).
details.content:
rm -rf questions.zip
7z a questions.zip integratedEnergySystemPrototypes.py cloudpss_inputs.json questions.md questions.pdf cloudpss_ieslab_connectivity_matrix.xlsx cloudpss_topology_screenshot.jpg
